duties_responsibilities.duty: Create and maintain master construction schedules primarily for construction management services
Interact with the project team and task managers to define the scope of work to develop and update detailed schedules, cost information, and identification of variances from the original plan
Analyze critical-path methods and constraints to determine the effect of changes to schedule and recommend work-around
Assist in the development of proposals
Participate in client meetings providing updates on schedule progress
Perform Earned Value Analysis on projects as required
Manage multiple projects totaling an estimated $100 mil in cost simultaneously

education_certification.credential: Bachelors in Engineering, Construction Management or related field
